Saves the authorization keys.

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the authorization service.","nullable":true,"example":"Winfield Upton"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"The user-friendly display title of the authorization service.","nullable":true,"example":"legacy_1080p_small_wooden_mouse"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"The brief description of the authorization service.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"instruction":{"type":"string","description":"The detailed instructions for configuring or using the authorization service.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"canSet":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the authorization service can be configured by the user.","example":true},"paid":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the authorization service is paid or not.","example":true},"props":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["name","value"],"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The authorization key name.","nullable":true,"example":"Winfield Upton"},"value":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"The authorization key value.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"The authorization key title.","nullable":true,"example":"legacy_1080p_small_wooden_mouse"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The authorization key parameters.","title":"AuthKey"},"description":"The collection of authorization keys associated with the authorization service.","nullable":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for handling the authorization service.","title":"AuthServiceRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
